name: Nature Notes Pocket Notebook
description:
You are in the woods. You spot a bird you have never seen before. You listen to its song, watch as it cleans its feathers while perched on a limb just overhead. Your mind is racing - take a picture, take a picture before it leaves! And as you bring your camera up to snap the photo, it's gone, lost in the canopy. Drats! Well at least you have this handy little notebook to write down a description of the bird, draw a sketch of it, before you forget! Just don't forget your pencil...

I based this hand carved stamp off of all of the sweet badges kids earn in scouting groups. Why should kids (and law enforcement officers) be the only ones with badges? You deserve a badge for being the type of person who cares to write things down the old-fashioned way - with a pencil or pen!

*************
Journal Information:
Moleskine Notebook
3.5 inches by 5.5 inches
64 lined or blank pages
Pocket in the back to store loose notes

The carved stamp does not come with the notebook. Sorry.

*************

Keep in mind that, due to its handmade nature, your journal may not look exactly like the one in the picture. But that is what makes handmade special, right? :)

name: Southwestern Escape Pocket Notebook
description:
This little notebook is perfect for the adventurer inspired by the beauty and simplicity of southwestern-inspired design. Measuring 3.5 inches by 5.5 inches, this 64-page journal featuring a southwestern-inspired design will fit into your back pocket easily! And as a little bonus, the journal itself has a little pocket on the back for you to stash away a little love note or a grocery receipt!

*************
Journal Information:
3.5 inches by 5.5 inches
64 lined or blank pages
Pocket in the back to store loose notes

*************
Curious about the odd seed pod in the photos? They are called Devil's Claw (Proboscidea parviflora) and are probably the strangest seed pods I have ever seen. My husband came across them in west Texas, and I have been infatuated ever since he brought a couple home.

*************

Keep in mind that, due to its handmade nature, your journal may not look exactly like the one in the picture. But that is what makes handmade special, right? :)

name: Telescope to the Stars Pocket Notebook
description:
Are you given to evenings spent caught up in the actions of the stars? Or know someone who is always contemplating all that the universe holds? I know plenty of people in both categories, and I think that this journal featuring the hand carved stamp of a telescope aiming at a lone star is the perfect gift idea for these starry-folks.

Measuring 3.5 inches by 5.5 inches, this 64-page journal featuring the telescope and star design will fit into your back pocket easily! And as a little bonus, the journal itself has a little pocket on the back for you to stash away a little love note or a grocery receipt!

*************
Journal Information:
3.5 inches by 5.5 inches
64 lined or blank pages
Pocket in the back to store loose notes

*************

Keep in mind that, due to its handmade nature, your journal may not look exactly like the one in the picture. But that is what makes handmade special, right? :)

name: Let It Rain 5x7 Print
description:
The Let It Rain print is printed on 100% cotton fiber, acid-free paper using archival pigment inks. Each print is packaged in a stiff cardboard mailer to ensure safe delivery.

The type on the print reads, "The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain - Henry Wadsworth Longfellow."

Please keep in mind that colors on different monitors may cause slight variation in colors.


Subtle Acts © All rights reserved.

name: Coral Beans 5x7 Print
description:
The Coral Beans print is printed on 100% cotton fiber, acid-free paper using archival pigment inks. Each print is packaged in a stiff cardboard mailer to ensure safe delivery.

Coral beans (Erythrina herbacea) are a native plant here in Texas. The beans are a brilliant red offset against darkness of the pods. The beans were found in wanderings in the woods of Texas.

Please keep in mind that colors on different monitors may cause slight variation in colors.


Subtle Acts © All rights reserved. Please request permission for use of this image prior to usage.

Coral beans (Erythrina herbacea) are a native plant here in Texas. The beans are a brilliant red offset against darkness of the pods. The beans and the old bottle were found in wanderings in the woods of Texas.

name: Evening Owl Gift Set - Pocket Notebook and Print
description:
The set features the following items:

*One Evening Owl 5x7 print, which is printed on 100% cotton fiber, acid-free paper using archival pigment inks. This print is based on a hand carved linocut design that has been digitized and colored.

* One pocket size notebook featuring the hand carved linocut design of the Evening Owl on the cover. The journal measures 3.5 inches by 5.5 inches, features 64 lined or blank pages (you choose at checkout), and includes a pocket in the back to store loose notes.

*******

name: Walt Whitman Gift Set - Notebook and Print
description:
The perfect gift for the Walt Whitman fan! The set features the following items:

*One Walt Whitman 5x7 print, which is printed on 100% cotton fiber, acid-free paper using archival pigment inks. This print is based on an original pen illustration that has been digitized and colored. The quote is taken from one of Whitman's signature poems, "Song of Myself," which is included in his work "Leaves of Grass."

* One pocket size notebook featuring the hand carved linocut design of Whitman's profile on the cover. The journal measures 3.5 inches by 5.5 inches, features 64 lined or blank pages (you choose at checkout), and includes a pocket in the back to store loose notes.

*******

name: Walt Whitman Pocket Notebook
description:
Gather a little inspiration from a master of the written word: Walt Whitman. This little pocket size journal featuring the profile of Walt Whitman that I hand carved will come in handy for my fellow written word lovers out there! Since it fits in your back pocket, you can take it just about anywhere! And as a little bonus, the journal itself has a little pocket on the back for you to stash away a little love note or a grocery receipt!

name: Beaver Jaw Print
description:
The Beaver Jaw print is printed on 100% cotton fiber, acid-free paper using archival pigment inks. Each print is packaged in a stiff cardboard mailer to ensure safe delivery.

The beaver (Castor canadensis) jaw used in the photograph was found while hiking in the fields of east Texas. Only half of the jaw was found, and tiny gnaw marks from rodents are present along the jaw. The exceptional quality of the print provides a three-dimensional aspect to the photo.

Please keep in mind that colors on different monitors may cause slight variation in colors.


Subtle Acts © All rights reserved.

name: Bluebird Nest with Eggs Print
description:
The Bluebird Nest with Eggs print is printed on 100% cotton fiber, acid-free paper using archival pigment inks. Each print is packaged in a stiff cardboard mailer to ensure safe delivery.

We found this bluebird nest and eggs while cleaning out the bluebird nesting boxes along the edge of our woods, something that has to be done each year after the broods have left. These little eggs never hatched.

Close-up details of the photo are provided in the additional photo.

Please keep in mind that colors on different monitors may cause slight variation in colors.


Subtle Acts © All rights reserved.

name: Evening Owl Print
description:
The Evening Owl is printed on 100% cotton fiber, acid-free paper using archival pigment inks. Each print is packaged in a stiff cardboard mailer to ensure safe delivery.

Please keep in mind that colors on different monitors may cause slight variation in colors. The dominant colors in this print are dark navy blue, yellow, brown, and creamy white. 

Subtle Acts © All rights reserved.

name: Lookout Fox Print
description:
The Lookout Fox is printed on 100% cotton fiber, acid-free paper using archival pigment inks. Each print is packaged in a stiff cardboard mailer to ensure safe delivery.

This print is based on an original pen illustration that has been digitized and colored. You can see the original pen illustration in the side photo.

Please keep in mind that colors on different monitors may cause slight variation in colors. The dominant colors in this print are shades of orange with a slight creamy yellow background.

*******

Subtle Acts © All rights reserved.

name: Walt Whitman Print
description:
The Walt Whitman print is printed on 100% cotton fiber, acid-free paper using archival pigment inks. Each print is packaged in a stiff cardboard mailer to ensure safe delivery.

This print is based on an original pen illustration that has been digitized and colored. The quote is taken from one of Whitman's signature poems, "Song of Myself," which is included in his work "Leaves of Grass."

"Stop this day and night with me and you shall possess the origin
of all poems,
You shall possess the good of the earth and sun.... there are
millions of suns left,
You shall no longer take things at second or third hand.... nor
look through the eyes of the dead, nor feed on the spectres
in books,
You shall not look through my eyes either, nor take things from me,
You shall listen to all sides and filter them from yourself."

Please keep in mind that colors on different monitors may cause slight variation in colors.

*******

Subtle Acts © All rights reserved.

name: Forest Deer Print
description:
The Forest Deer is printed on 100% cotton fiber, acid-free paper using archival pigment inks. Each print is packaged in a stiff cardboard mailer to ensure safe delivery.

This print is based on an original pen illustration that has been digitized and colored using digital photographs of the local landscape, including the woods that surround my home.

Please keep in mind that colors on different monitors may cause slight variation in colors.

name: Soaring Owl Moleskine Notebook
description:
This pocket size journal would make the perfect gift for the nature lover! I hand carved the design of a gorgeous soaring owl scoping out the ground below and stamped the image on the cover of a Moleksine journal.

Measuring 3.5 inches by 5.5 inches, this lined journal will fit into your back pocket easily! And as a little bonus, the journal itself has a little pocket on the back for you to stash away a little love note or a grocery receipt!

This handy dandy little Moleskine notebook features the design of a horse that I hand carved onto a rubber stamp. description:
Because maybe you need a little unicorn to keep your secrets...because as we all know, unicorns are good at keeping secrets.


*************

name: Campfire Stories Moleskine Notebook
description:
There is something about being gathered around a campfire that makes us want to open up and tell stories. Some stories are true while many others are meant to scare us into staying up all night in our tents listening for some sort of monster bear lurking in the deep, dark forest.

So when you get back in your tent and are too scared to switch off the lantern, how about grabbing this handy little 64-page, pocket-size journal to jot down some of your favorite stories as you wait for the morning light to finally come? Or grab a couple...it is a long wait till morning.

*************
Journal Information:
3.5 inches by 5.5 inches
64 lined or blank pages - you choose at checkout
Pocket in the back to store loose notes
*************

Keep in mind that, due to its handmade nature, your journal may not look exactly like the one in the picture. But that is what makes handmade special, right? :)

name: Camp Out Set - Three Moleskine Camping Notebooks
description:
Ready to hit the trails and reconnect with Nature? You just might need this three-notebook set featuring the hand-carved designs of a tent, canteen, and campfire to record your adventures! Usually $10 a piece, you can get three of these little guys for $27 plus shipping!

Measuring 3.5 inches by 5.5 inches, these little lined journals will fit into your back pocket easily! You can probably fit all three journals in that back pocket! And as a little bonus, each journals has a little pocket on the back for you to stash away a little love note or a grocery receipt!


*************

Keep in mind that, due to its handmade nature, your journals may not look exactly like the ones in the pictures. But that is what makes handmade special, right? :)


*************

Note: The hand-carved linocut stamps do not come with the notebooks.

name: Grasshopper in Your Pocket Moleskine Notebook
description:
Summer in my part of the world equals grasshoppers clinging to just about anything and everything. You can't take a step outside without having a grasshopper bounce off your leg!

This little pocket size journal featuring the image of a grasshopper that I hand carved will come in handy for my fellow nature lovers out there! Since it fits in your back pocket, you can take it just about anywhere! And as a little bonus, the journal itself has a little pocket on the back for you to stash away a little love note or a grocery receipt!


*************
Journal Information:
3.5 inches by 5.5 inches
64 blank or lined pages 
Pocket in the back to store loose notes

*************

Note:
The hand carved stamp does not come with the notebook.

Keep in mind that, due to its handmade nature, your journal may not look exactly like the one in the picture. But that is what makes handmade special, right? :)

name: Pronghorn Moleskine Pocket Notebook
description:
My husband and I went to college right outside of Amarillo, in the panhandle of Texas. Growing up in the piney woods of east Texas, the high plains of the panhandle offers a dramatic contrast in not only the landscape, but also the flora and fauna. The pronghorn that roam the plains surrounding Amarillo were such an exciting creature to watch run in herds. And while they may seem like an exotic animal, they are actually native to the panhandle area as well as far north as southern Canada.

This little pocket size notebook featuring the image of a framed male pronghorn that I hand carved will come in handy for my fellow nature lovers out there! Since it fits in your back pocket, you can take it just about anywhere! And as a little bonus, the notebook itself has a little pocket on the back for you to stash away a little love note or a grocery receipt!


Notebook Information:
3.5 inches by 5.5 inches
64 lined or blank pages
Pocket in the back to store loose notes

*************

Keep in mind that, due to its handmade nature, your notebook may not look exactly like the one in the picture. But that is what makes handmade special, right? :)

name: Handsome Dog Moleskine Notebook
description:
I have to admit it. I am a dog person. We have two dogs, Punky and Scout, we adopted from a local shelter and who keep us entertained, are always ready to give a little love, and always hoping for a treat. The handsome fellow this hand carved linocut print is based on, Clyde, is a rescued redbone coonhound (the same breed as Old Dan and Little Ann in Where the Red Fern Grows) sweetheart adopted by my friends, Elizabeth and Chris. Clyde is a regal gentleman, as you may be able to tell from the print, who enjoys long walks through the neighborhood, playing with his people and his his fellow pups, Custer and Bonnie, and cozying up under a blanket.


*************
Journal Information:
3.5 inches by 5.5 inches
64 lined or blank pages
Pocket in the back to store loose notes

*************

Please note that the hand carved linocut block does not come with the notebook.

Keep in mind that, due to its handmade nature, your journal may not look exactly like the one in the picture. But that is what makes handmade special, right? :)

name: Begging Dog Moleskine Notebook
description:
I have two little dogs that seem to constantly beg for a treat. They really never do anything to "deserve" a treat - they don't know any tricks and they never clean up after themselves. But, they do make me laugh and that is enough for me to give them a little something special. :)

I carved this design for all of you out there who have the same kind of begging dogs that I do or know someone else that does! I stamped a handy notebook with this cute little dog so you can go through your day and remember that little pup at home waiting to show off his/her eating skills. And as a little bonus, the notebook itself has a little pocket on the back for you to stash away a little love note or a grocery receipt for doggie treats!

************
Journal Information:
3.5 inches by 5.5 inches
64 lined or blank pages
Pocket in the back to store loose notes

*************

Please note that the hand carved linocut block does not come with the notebook.

Keep in mind that, due to its handmade nature, your journal may not look exactly like the one in the picture. But that is what makes handmade special, right? :)

name: Washington State Geography Moleskine Notebook
description:
Oh, Washington! How I love your beautiful rocky shorelines, your verdant mountainsides, your perfect temperatures! The list goes on and on. I have such fond memories of living along the Puget Sound, close enough to the water to hear the ferries blow their horn. We have been away from our "Second Hometown" for four years now and, being a little nostalgic of those lucky days I decided to carve this stamp of my favorite state.

The photos of the beach are of beautiful Ruby Beach, one of the most beautiful places I have ever been.

*************
Journal Information:
3.5 inches by 5.5 inches
64 lined or blank pages
Pocket in the back to store loose notes

*************

Keep in mind that, due to its handmade nature, your journal may not look exactly like the one in the picture. But that is what makes handmade special, right? :)

name: Steinbeck Moleskine Notebook
description:
East of Eden, Grapes of Wrath, Of Mice and Men, Tortilla Flat, Cannery Row, Travels with Charley, America and Americans...oh, I love John Steinbeck! I happen to think that he is one of the best American writers out there. Which is why I felt the impulse to carve my latest stamp featuring Steinbeck's portrait as a young man in his prime.

Journal Information:
3.5 inches by 5.5 inches
64 lined or blank pages
Pocket in the back to store loose notes

*************


Keep in mind that, due to its handmade nature, your journal may not look exactly like the one in the picture. But that is what makes handmade special, right? :)

name: Second Brain Moleskine Notebook
description:
Sometimes feel like you need a little something to help you keep up with it all? A second brain maybe? I know, I know...we all use our computers, smart phones, tablets, etc. to store all of the excess, right? But this little notebook featuring an image of a brain that I hand carved doesn't require any batteries, won't catch a virus, and won't become obsolete the second you buy it.

*************
Journal Information:
3.5 inches by 5.5 inches
64 lined or blank pages
Pocket in the back to store loose notes

*************


Keep in mind that, due to its handmade nature, your journal may not look exactly like the one in the picture. But that is what makes handmade special, right? :)

name: Framed Great Horned Owl Moleskine Notebook
description:
Our little house is surrounded by thick woods, woods that at night are full of the sounds of nature. Dusk settles in around here and it's not long before we begin to hear the hoots of owls intermingle with the sounds of other nocturnal creatures. It's a reassuring sound, letting us know that our woods are healthy enough to provide a home to so many wild creatures.

This little pocket size journal featuring the image of a framed great horned owl that I hand carved will come in handy for my fellow nature lovers out there! Since it fits in your back pocket, you can take it just about anywhere! And as a little bonus, the journal itself has a little pocket on the back for you to stash away a little love note or a grocery receipt!


*************
Journal Information:
3.5 inches by 5.5 inches
64 lined or blank pages
Pocket in the back to store loose notes

*************

Keep in mind that, due to its handmade nature, your journal may not look exactly like the one in the picture. But that is what makes handmade special, right? :

name: Framed Fox Moleskine Notebook
description:
Our woods are filled with all sorts of beautiful wild animals. We can go days without seeing any animals outside of squirrels or possums or rabbits. But every so often, we are lucky enough to catch glimpses of more elusive creatures like foxes. It is such a rare treat that when we do see one, we talk about it for days later, wondering when the next sighting will be.

I carved this little fox in the hopes of catching the regal, independent nature I feel foxes have.


*************
Journal Information:
3.5 inches by 5.5 inches
64 lined or blank pages
Pocket in the back to store loose notes

*************

Keep in mind that, due to its handmade nature, your journal may not look exactly like the one in the picture. But that is what makes handmade special, right? :)

name: Colt Peacemaker Moleskine Notebook
description:
Here by popular demand (read as: my husband really wanted one), this new journal is perfect for that certain special guy. This hand carved stamp depicts the Colt Peacemaker, a revolver that has been in service since 1873. No holster is needed for this journal - it fits easily into your back pocket! And as a little bonus, the journal itself has a little pocket on the back for you to stash away a little love note or a grocery receipt!

This 64-page, lined journal measures 3.5 inches by 5.5 inches.

Keep in mind that, due to its handmade nature, your journal may not look exactly like the one in the picture. But that is what makes handmade special, right? :)

name: Idea Light Bulb Moleskine Notebook
description:
Featured in the 2011 Huffington Post Work Husband Holiday Gift Guide!

We all have something to say, something that we need to remember, some great idea that will surely flee if we don't write it down on paper. Maybe you need to jot down a witty thought now and then, or something poetic crosses your mind from time to time. Or maybe you just need to scribble a grocery list.

This hand stamped journal featuring the design of an idea light bulb that I hand carved onto a stamp will surely meet your needs! Measuring 3.5 inches by 5.5 inches, this 64-page lined or blank notebook will fit into your back pocket easily! And as a little bonus, the journal itself has a little pocket on the back for you to stash away a little love note or a grocery receipt!

*************
Journal Information:
3.5 inches by 5.5 inches
64 lined or blank pages
Pocket in the back to store loose notes

*************
Keep in mind that, due to its handmade nature, your journal may not look exactly like the one in the picture. But that is what makes handmade special, right? :)
